items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A standard potion that restores a moderate amount of health.

items.name: Bear Claw Dagger
items.description: A dagger with a handle made from bone and a blade fashioned from a large bear claw.

items.name: Leather Armor Piece
items.description: A well-crafted piece of leather armor. Offers light protection.

items.name: Bear Tooth Necklace
items.description: A necklace made from bear teeth. Surprisingly well crafted.

items.name: Silver Coins
items.description: A small handful of silver coins.

items.name: Crystal Fragment
items.description: A small fragment of a strange blue crystal. It pulses with faint energy.
